org.agent.slang.out.bml.marc.socket

Class MarcSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.agent.slang.out.bml.marc.socket.MarcSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPSocket, UDPSocket

    public abstract class MarcSocket
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class provides general message passing and socket functionalities in order to send and receive data to/from MARC toolkit. OS Compatibility: Windows and Linux
    Version:
    1, 10/19/13
    Author:
    Ovidiu Serban, ovidiu@roboslang.org
